mapper.select: SELECT id,storageType, CASE WHEN storageType=1 THEN '网易云' WHEN storageType=2 THEN '阿里云' WHEN storageType=3 THEN '又拍云' WHEN storageType=4 THEN '七牛云' WHEN storageType=5 THEN '本地' WHEN storageType=6 THEN '腾讯云' WHEN storageType=7 THEN 'FTP' WHEN storageType=8 THEN 'UFile' ELSE '未知' END AS storageName, keyname FROM `keys` GROUP BY storageType
mapper.update: UPDATE `keys` SET AccessKey = #{AccessKey}, AccessSecret = #{AccessSecret}, Endpoint = #{Endpoint}, Bucketname = #{Bucketname}, RequestAddress = #{RequestAddress}, keyname = #{keyname} WHERE storageType = #{storageType}
